verses.text: Now \w the|strong="H5922"\w* prophets, \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* prophet, \w and|strong="H2148"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*, \w prophesied|strong="H5013"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w* \w and|strong="H2148"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* God \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \add prophesied they\add* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6966"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2217"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7598"\w*, \w and|strong="H5029"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3443"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*, \w and|strong="H5029"\w* \w began|strong="H8271"\w* \w to|strong="H5974"\w* \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w at|strong="H6966"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; \w and|strong="H5029"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w them|strong="H5974"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5029"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God, \w helping|strong="H5583"\w* \w them|strong="H5974"\w*.

At \w the|strong="H5922"\w* same \w time|strong="H2166"\w* came \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w* \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w River|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w*, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* their \w companions|strong="H3675"\w*, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* said \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w*, \w Who|strong="H4479"\w* \w gave|strong="H7761"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w finish|strong="H3635"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* wall?

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* told them after \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w manner|strong="H3660"\w*, \w what|strong="H4479"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* making \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w*.

But \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w eye|strong="H5870"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* their God \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w they|strong="H3809"\w* \w did|strong="H1994"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w make|strong="H3809"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* cease, \w till|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w matter|strong="H2941"\w* should come \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* then \w answer|strong="H8421"\w* should \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w* \w by|strong="H8421"\w* \w letter|strong="H5407"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* letter \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w River|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w companions|strong="H3675"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Apharsachites, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w River|strong="H5103"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*;

\w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w letter|strong="H6600"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H1459"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w written|strong="H3790"\w* \w thus|strong="H1836"\w*: \w Unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w peace|strong="H8001"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1934"\w* \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* went into \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* God, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w with|strong="H1124"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* stones, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* timber \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w laid|strong="H7761"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w walls|strong="H3797"\w*; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w goeth|strong="H5648"\w* on \w with|strong="H1124"\w* diligence \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w prospereth|strong="H6744"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*.

Then \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* those \w elders|strong="H7868"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* said unto them \w thus|strong="H1836"\w*, \w Who|strong="H4479"\w* \w gave|strong="H7761"\w* you \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w finish|strong="H3635"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* wall?

\w We|strong="H1768"\w* \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* them \w their|strong="H7593"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* also, \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w certify|strong="H3046"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* might \w write|strong="H3790"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* at \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* them.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w thus|strong="H1836"\w* \w they|strong="H3660"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w* \w us|strong="H8421"\w* \w answer|strong="H6600"\w*, saying, \w We|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* God \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w many|strong="H7690"\w* \w years|strong="H8140"\w* \w ago|strong="H6928"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w finished|strong="H3635"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3861"\w* \w after|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w our|strong="H4481"\w* fathers \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w provoked|strong="H7265"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* God \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w unto|strong="H3052"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7265"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w into|strong="H1541"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon, \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w Chaldean|strong="H3679"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H5642"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w carried|strong="H1541"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w away|strong="H1541"\w* \w into|strong="H1541"\w* Babylon.

\w But|strong="H1297"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* Babylon, \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w also|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w took|strong="H5312"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w brought|strong="H2987"\w* into \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon, \w those|strong="H1994"\w* \w did|strong="H1994"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w take|strong="H5312"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3052"\w* \w unto|strong="H3052"\w* one \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w*;

\w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, \w Take|strong="H5376"\w* \w these|strong="H1994"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w*, go, \w put|strong="H5182"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* its \w place|strong="H5182"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w came|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w same|strong="H1791"\w* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w laid|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* foundations \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H8000"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*: \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w since|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* time \w even|strong="H1768"\w* \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* hath \w it|strong="H4481"\w* been \w in|strong="H8000"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* yet \w it|strong="H4481"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w completed|strong="H8000"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5922"\w*, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* seem \w good|strong="H2869"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w there|strong="H8536"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*â€™s \w treasure|strong="H1596"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w there|strong="H8536"\w* \w at|strong="H8536"\w* Babylon, \w whether|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w so|strong="H1768"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God \w at|strong="H8536"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w send|strong="H7972"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7470"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w us|strong="H5922"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w matter|strong="H1836"\w*.
